name: Cheesy Potato Soup II
author: Joan Zaffary
summary: A simple, cheesy potato soup. This soup takes less than an hour to make. You can break up the potatoes with a fork if you want a thicker soup.
ingredients: 15 slices American cheese - broken into pieces
directions: Melt the butter in a large pot over medium heat
Saute the onions and celery in the butter for 5 to 10 minutes, or until tender
Stir in the water and potatoes, bring to a boil and then simmer until the potatoes are tender
Add the cheese and stir until melted
In a separate small bowl, combine the flour and the milk and stir well until the flour is mostly dissolved
Pour this into the soup slowly, stirring constantly, until soup has thickened, about 5 minutes
